sentences.en: A great chunk of loose kerbing smashed into my left-front wheel, bursting the tyre and denting the rim.
sentences.cn: 我车子的左前轮撞在一大块松动的路缘石上，导致车胎爆裂、轮辋凹陷。

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.en: He brought in a chunk of wood last night.
sentences.cn: 他昨晚拿进来一块木头.

sentences.en: I don't want to see you lose a chunk of that pretty blond hair!
sentences.cn: 我不想看到你的金发被扯掉一块!

sentences.en: I've completed a fair chunk of my article.
sentences.cn: 我已经把文章的一大部分写完了.

sentences.en: It was only a stone or a chunk.
sentences.cn: 原来那不过是碰到了一块石头或是一块木头.

sentences.en: It's a little chunk of history that they've forgotten to alter.
sentences.cn: 这小块历史,他们忘了改掉啦.

sentences.en: Mary, get me a silk thread, and a chunk of fire out of the kitchen. "
sentences.cn: 玛丽, 拿根丝线给我, 再到厨房去弄块烧红的火炭来. ”

sentences.en: The car repairs took quite a chunk out of her salary.
sentences.cn: 修理汽车的费用占掉她工资相当大的一笔钱.

sentences.en: The committees get a chunk of all five Olympic revenue streams.
sentences.cn: 奥林匹克所有五项收入中,组委会在每一项上都拿大头.

sentences.en: The company owns a chunk of farmland near Gatwick Airport.
sentences.cn: 该公司拥有盖特威克机场周边的大片农田。

sentences.en: The manager of a company does not like having a large chunk of his wealth bound up in its shares.
sentences.cn: 一家公司经理不愿意让大笔财富套在股票里。

sentences.en: Then she seized the chunk of fire and suddenly thrust it almost into the boy's face.
sentences.cn: 然后她拿起那块烧红的火炭,猛地朝汤姆脸面伸过去,差点碰到他的脸.

sentences.en: Want to be circled again later, had checked others one big chunk.
sentences.cn: 以后想再绕回来, 都已经查了别人一大截.

sentences.en: Zurich's affluence came initially from cornering a sizeable chunk of the 14th Century silk trade.
sentences.cn: 苏黎世的富足最初来自于14世纪对丝绸贸易的高度垄断。

trans.tran_cn: 厚块，大量，〈语言学〉话语组成部分
trans.tran_en: a large thick piece of something that does not have an even shape
